# font()

**Instance Method**

Returns the font used for the annotation’s text field.

## Declaration

```swift
func font() -> NSFont!
```

## Return Value

The font used for text in the annotation’s text field.

## Managing the Font and Font Color

- **setFont(_:)**: Sets the font used in the text field of the annotation.
- **fontColor()**: Returns the font color used for the annotation’s text field.
- **setFontColor(_:)**: Sets the font color used for the annotation’s text field.
